Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 112nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1970...
Injured on 6/27/1971 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/11/1972 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Cleveland on 1/31/1973 (Going to STL: 1B G. Ratliff. Going to CLE: 2B L. Milbourne, LF G. Burke, CF H. Cruz)...
Injured on 6/7/1976 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/26/1977, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
Injured on 8/12/1978 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Released by Cleveland on 7/7/1981...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/1/1984 to a minor league contract.
